code: import React from'react';import shops from'../../data/shops.js';function Shops(props){var handleChange=props.handleChange;var shopsData=shops.results;var shopOptions=shopsData.map(function(shop,index){return React.createElement("option",{key:index,value:shop.name},shop.long_name);});return React.createElement("select",{name:"shop",onChange:handleChange},React.createElement("option",null,"Shops"),shopOptions);}export default Shops;
